docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, June 6.--The value of exports of merchandise, including re-exports, from the United States in April, as reported today by the Division of Foreign Trade Statistics of the Department of Commerce, was $230,947,000, compared with $274,472,000...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, June 6.--The value of exports of merchandise, including re-exports, from the United States in April, as reported today by the Division of Foreign Trade Statistics of the Department of Commerce, was $230,947,000, compared with $274,472,000 in April, 1938. docs.snippet: IN Latin America a big international poker game is being played. The stakes are trade and prestige. The best hands are held by the United  States and Nazi Germany. Fascist Italy is also sitting in; likewise militaristic Japan.
